<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/recurring-payments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>




## 부가설명 및 특이사항
정기결제를 조회하는 API 입니다.

### v1.0 
페이징 처리를 위한 totalCount를 제공하지 않습니다.
```
[
 {
  "recurringPaymentId": "",
  ...
 },
 ...
]
```

### v1.1
페이징 처리를 위한 totalCount를 제공합니다.
자세한 정보는 Responses 항목 참고 바랍니다.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"startYmd","in":"query","description":"시작일","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"YYYY-MM-DD"},{"name":"endYmd","in":"query","description":"종료일","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"YYYY-MM-DD"},{"name":"statusTypes","in":"query","description":"정기결제 상태 리스트","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ACTIVE,SYSTEM_PAUSED"},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"페이지 번호 (1 이상)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number"},"example":"1"},{"name":"size","in":"query","description":"페이지당 노출 개수","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number"},"example":"30"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.1"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"accessToken","in":"header","description":"회원 엑세스 토큰","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-access-token"},{"name":"Shop-By-Authorization","in":"header","description":"액세스 토큰(Oauth2 스펙)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Bearer test-access-token"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

사용자 해지]","example":"ACTIVE","enum":["WAITING: Waiting","ACTIVE: Active","SYSTEM_CLOSED: Closed by System","ADMIN_CLOSED: Closed by Admin","USER_CLOSED: Closed by User","ROUND_FINISHED: Round 일자 (nullable)","example":"YYYY-MM-DD"},"registerYmd":{"type":"string","description":"정기배송
